Member of the Advisory Group on Environment and Health (TAG_ChE) odf the IPA Mandate of the Group is to improve the understanding of the effect of environment on child health within the pediatric community and support pediatric resources that will contribute to better understanding and improved health policy. Major efforts of the TAG-CHE are directed to strengthening the materials and tools that can be used in training. TAG-CHE recently collaborated with WHO in the revision of nineteen WHO PowerPoint modules in the Training Package on Children’s Environmental Health.
